translation.en: [men chanting in Latin] Thus has it always been, and thus shall it ever be.
[Neil] "Do not weep for me For I have not gone"
translation.ko: '나를 위해 울지 마시오 나는 떠나지 않았으니'

translation.en: "I am the wind that shakes the mighty oak"
"I am the gentle rain That falls upon your face"
"I am the spring flower That pushes through the dark earth"
translation.ko: '어두운 흙을 뚫고 고개를 내미는 봄꽃이자' "할런 코벤 소설 원작"

translation.en: "I am the chuckling laughter Of the mountain stream"
[vicar] Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil.
translation.ko: '나 비록 음산한 죽음의 골짜기를 지날지라도 무서울 것 없어라'

translation.en: Thy rod and thy staff, they comfort me.
We commit our brother to the ground.
So, seeing as we're both here at this ridiculous charity party,
translation.ko: 이런 시시한 자선 파티에서 만난 것도 인연이니

translation.en: would you allow me to buy you a drink?
Have whatever you want. My treat.
in 11 hours, I'll be on a plane back to base.
Well, in that case, we'd better make the most of the time that we have,

translation.ko: - 괜찮은 거지? - 응, 와 줘서 고마워

translation.en: What, you've come for the catering? Or you've found my husband's killer?
translation.ko: 식사하러 오신 거예요, 아니면 살인범 잡아서 오신 거예요?

translation.en: [Maya] Oh. Well, you'd think a psychiatrist would know better.
translation.ko: 그래요? 정신과 선생님 말씀이니 따르는 게 낫다고 생각하셨나 봐요

translation.en: Not today, but there's some things I need to follow up on, about the attack.
translation.ko: 오늘 여쭤볼 건 아니지만 사건 관련해서 드릴 질문이 있어요

translation.en: Look, I have given you three statements, and you're no closer to catching them.
translation.ko: 이미 진술을 세 번이나 했는데 범인을 잡을 기미가 없잖아요

translation.en: Why did you invite that detective?
I wanted him to see who Joe was.
That he was loved by his brothers and sister.
That he grew up in this big house
translation.ko: 조가 어린 시절을 보낸 이 저택을

translation.en: I lost the love of my life.
There's something more going on with you.
translation.ko: 넌 그 감정이 다가 아닌 것 같아

translation.en: I don't want to push you today, but I think you should get help.
translation.ko: 오늘 잔소리하기는 싫다만 넌 도움이 필요해

translation.en: There's so much you're dealing with. First, you lose your sister.
translation.ko: 너무 많은 일이 있었잖니 자매를 잃은 데다가

translation.en: I'd better attend to the guests.
I must have told them ten times, play The Doors,
translation.ko: 도어스 노래 틀자고 내가 열 번은 말했을 거야

translation.en: [in posh voice] Play Nirvana? At a funeral?
-Do you know how much they spent? -Go on.
translation.ko: - 장례식에 얼마 쓴지 알아? - 말해 봐

translation.en: The coffin cost more than your car.
I don't want to leave you.
Look, I know you think you will,
but I don't care if it's 3:00 in the morning,
if you have a wobble… yeah?
translation.ko: 막 새벽 3시에 마음이 불안하면 언제든지… 알겠지?

translation.en: Oh, which reminds me. -I've got something for you. -Oh?
It rotates photos of you and your family.
I've already pre-loaded some of you, Joe, Lily, and the family.
translation.ko: 조, 릴리랑 함께 찍은 사진을 내가 이미 몇 장 등록했어

translation.en: Except, that's not all it is.
[chuckles] Do you want to see that funky move again? Please.
translation.ko: - 방금 춤 다시 보고 싶지? - 참아 줘

translation.en: Well, you can. It's all caught on here, on a secret camera,
translation.ko: 녹화했으니 다시 볼 수 있어 비밀 카메라가 있거든

translation.en: Why have you got me a secret camera?
So you can keep an eye on Lily when you're not here.
translation.ko: 이러면 집을 비울 때도 릴리를 볼 수 있잖아
이저벨라가 돌볼 때? 맞아, 보모 감시 카메라지

translation.en: but what harm does it do to keep an eye on her?
translation.ko: 네가 지켜본다고 뭐, 해가 될 거 있겠어?

translation.en: Eva, her family's and Joe's go way back.
translation.ko: 에바, 이저벨라와 조는 옛날부터 가족끼리 알고 지냈어

translation.en: Well, I am putting it in her playroom.

translation.ko: - 수업 들을 준비 됐나요? - 네, 기대되네요
- 수업 들을 준비 됐나요? - 네, 기대되네요 시작하죠

translation.en: Okay, you can take her up today.
If you'd like to take a slight turn to the left.
Right. Keep-- Keep your eyes on the horizon.
That's a nasty graze to his elbow there.
Is that what they teach military police? -I was aiming for his elbow. -Ah.
translation.ko: - 헌병대에서 그렇게 가르치나? - 일부러 겨냥한 거야

translation.en: No. Wouldn't want to embarrass you.
translation.ko: 안 돼, 너 창피 주기 싫어

translation.en: How long have you been back at work?
What am I supposed to do?
Sit at home, stare at a wall?
Listen, me and the guys, we were talking…
-Oh, go on. -How about we come over this weekend?
translation.ko: - 뭔데, 또? - 주말에 우리가 집에 놀러 갈까?

translation.en: Nothing crazy. Just a few drinks. Keep you company.
translation.ko: 가볍게 몇 잔 어때? 같이 있어 주고 싶어서 그래

translation.en: So, it's too soon for me to be back in work,
-but not for a piss-up, hmm? -[buzzer sounds]
-Hi! -Hi, Maya. Hi. Has everything been all right?
Of course. We've had fun, haven't we, Lily? Yeah?
-[Izabella] Why don't you show Mummy? -Go on. Go on.
-[Lily] Come. Come with me. -[Maya] You go in. One minute.
translation.ko: 엄마도 와요 곧 갈게, 먼저 들어가

translation.en: -[Lily giggles] -She's been talking about heaven, so I-- Yeah, no, it's fine. It's fine.
translation.ko: - 릴리가 자꾸 천국 얘기를 해서… - 네, 걱정 마세요

translation.en: It's fine. I'm going to, uh, look at these amazing angels.

translation.ko: - 내가 이기고 있어 - 다 컸네, 우리 딸

translation.en: Right, breakfast. Go and sit down.
Go and sit in your chair.
Hi, Judith. Listen, I'm just rushing off to work.
translation.ko: 안녕하세요, 어머님 지금 출근 때문에 바빠서요

translation.en: I thought you could come over to Farnwood this weekend with Lily.
That's kind of you, um, but I can't this weekend.
translation.ko: 말씀만으로도 감사한데 제가 친구들이랑 선약이 있어서요

translation.en: -I've arranged to see friends. -She spent a lot of time here, Maya,
translation.ko: 제가 친구들이랑 선약이 있어서요 마이아, 네가 집 비울 때 릴리는 여기에 자주 왔어
마이아, 네가 집 비울 때 릴리는 여기에 자주 왔어

translation.en: I know you're not used to being a full-time mother,
Listen, why don't I call you later and we can arrange another day?
translation.ko: 어머님, 제가 전화 드릴 테니 그때 날짜 다시 잡을까요?

translation.en: I'm only thinking about what's best for Lily.
translation.ko: 릴리에게 최선의 환경을 주고 싶어서 그래

translation.en: Did you see Daddy yesterday when I wasn't here?
translation.ko: 어제 엄마 없을 때 아빠 왔어?

translation.en: He came over, and he-- and he gave you a cuddle, and he sat you on his lap?
translation.ko: 아빠가 집에 와서 너 안고 무릎에 앉혔어?

translation.en: Okay. All right, Mommy's being silly. I'm sorry.
translation.ko: 알았어, 엄마가 바보 같은 소리를 해서 미안

translation.en: I need to show you something.
-You're spying on me? -Right, just watch, watch.
-How do you explain this? -I don't know what you mean.
That man there, you saw him. You saw who that was?
-It's Joe! How the hell can that be? -Please, Mrs. Burkett, you're scaring me!
translation.ko: - 조잖아요! 이게 말이 돼요? - 이러지 마세요, 무섭다고요

translation.en: He's dead, and he's there on the camera whilst you were in the house.
translation.ko: 당신이 집에 있을 때 죽은 조가 카메라에 녹화됐다고요

translation.en: It's all right, darling. Just go back in and watch your show.
translation.ko: 별일 아니야, 가서 영상 마저 봐

translation.en: Go on. It's all right. It's okay.
No. No, I'm a gifted comedian.
Nothing warms up a crowd like the "pepper spray nanny" routine.
translation.ko: 보모가 스프레이 쐈다는 농담이 분위기 띄우기에는 최고죠

translation.en: All right, Maya. That's a serious offense.
Can I ask what prompted it?
I saw something on my nanny cam, and I challenged her about it.
translation.ko: 감시 카메라에 뭐가 찍혀서 보모한테 추궁했어요
- 내가 미쳤다고 생각할 거예요 - 말씀해 보세요

translation.en: -Gone? -[sputtering] Yeah, the SD card is gone.
-It was an old tape. -No, it wasn't. It was from yesterday.
translation.ko: - 옛날 영상인가 보네요 - 아뇨, 어제 찍힌 영상이에요

translation.en: -You know that-- You know that can't be. -He was wearing his green shirt.
translation.ko: 말이 안 되잖아요 녹색 상의를 입고 있었는데 옷장에서 그 옷이 없어졌어요

translation.en: That's not in his wardrobe. Or his shoes.
translation.ko: 녹색 상의를 입고 있었는데 옷장에서 그 옷이 없어졌어요 신발도 그렇고요

translation.en: Are you sure it was Joe, Maya?
He went to Lily, and she cuddled him.
translation.ko: 조는 릴리한테 가서 그 애를 안아 줬어요

translation.en: -Grief can do funny things. -It's not grief.
translation.ko: - 너무 슬프면 이럴 수 있어요 - 슬퍼서 이러는 게 아녜요

translation.en: -[clears throat] Okay. -You wanted to ask me a few questions?
In your original statement on the night of the attack,
translation.ko: 사건 당일 밤에 하신 진술에 따르면

translation.en: you said two masked youths appeared in the park on scramble bikes.
translation.ko: 마스크 쓴 청년 둘이 오프로드 바이크를 몰고 - 공원에 나타났다고 했죠 - 네

translation.en: And then you said they stopped in front of you
and attempted to grab your bag.
I resisted. A fight broke out.
Um, one of them had hold of my bag, he wouldn't let go, and I, uh, was pushed.
translation.ko: 한 놈이 가방을 붙들고 늘어지며 나를 밀쳤어요

translation.en: They were demanding that Joe handed over his wallet, and he wouldn't.
translation.ko: 놈들이 지갑을 달라는데 조가 주지 않았어요

translation.en: Then, all of a sudden, out of nowhere,
I tried to call for help.
But before I could, I just heard…
By the time I got to Joe…
Besides a very detailed description of the suspects,
translation.ko: 용의자 인상착의를 아주 상세하게 묘사해 주셨는데

translation.en: you were able to tell us that the youth in the red Nike trainers
To identify a weapon like that.
As you know, despite never finding the weapon itself,
translation.ko: 아시다시피 범행에 쓴 총기를 찾지는 못했지만

translation.en: we recovered three bullets from your husband's body
translation.ko: 남편분 시신에서 총알 세 개를 발견했고

translation.en: and three cases from the scene consistent with a Glock 17.
translation.ko: 글록 17과 일치하는 구경의 탄피 세 개가 현장에서 나왔죠

translation.en: Now, you own guns, don't you, Maya?
Do you keep any of them here?
No one can get their hands on them, especially Lily.
translation.ko: 릴리는 물론이고 아무도 건드릴 수 없죠

translation.en: Well, how do you open it?
That's, uh, quite the collection. Does anyone else have access to these?
translation.ko: 엄청난 수집품이군요 열 수 있는 사람이 또 있나요?

translation.en: No. Well, Joe used to. But…
-[Sami] Is this your only handgun? -Yep. The only one.
And it's legally registered as deactivated.
translation.ko: 발사 불가 총기로 당국에도 등록돼 있고요

translation.en: As I'm sure you already know.
So shall we stop playing games and you tell me what it is that you want?
translation.ko: 그러니 변죽 그만 울리고 목적을 말씀해 주실래요?

translation.en: is to go away and test it. Go on.
-What, you think I killed my husband? -No, Maya.
You buried him. I was there.
translation.ko: 남편분을 매장할 때 저도 거기 있었죠

translation.en: So he wasn't on the nanny cam.
Hiya, sweetheart. How was your day?
Yeah, good. Well, I say good.
I had a six-year-old say "bellend" this morning.
So, tonight, you got your dancing shoes ready?
Yeah? And it's side together, side tap, side together. Yes?
translation.ko: 기억하지? 사이드 투게더 사이드 탭, 사이드 투게더

translation.en: [man] And there's a board members' call at 2:45.
-It's in your diary. -Mm. Joy of joys.
I need to ask you something about Joe.
When you, uh… when you went to see him…
Why on earth would you ask me that?
"What did he look like?" What sort of a question is that, Maya?
translation.ko: 어떤 모습이었냐고? 무슨 그런 질문을 하니?

translation.en: Because I never saw his body.
translation.ko: 전 조의 시신을 본 적이 없어서요

translation.en: Maya, please. I urge you to think again about counseling.
translation.ko: 마이아, 부탁이니 제발 상담 좀 받아 보자

translation.en: I have an excellent colleague at the clinic. Specializes in grief.
translation.ko: 병원에 훌륭한 동료가 있는데 슬픔 상담 전문이야

translation.en: Please, just tell me what he looked like.
-There's no stigma attached to it, Maya. -Judith.
He looked like what he was.
[chuckles dryly] Yeah, from nowhere. It jumped out, I swerved.
Next thing I know, I've hit a fence.
-Are you okay? -Yeah, yeah, yeah. Not a scratch, unlike the car.

translation.ko: - 새 차 받을 수 있을까? - 응, 아마도

translation.en: But, Sami, I'm just going to ask you this straight.
-Oh, come on, Pam. -You've had your challenges.
translation.ko: 이러지 마, 팸 원래도 어려움을 겪었잖아

translation.en: And I know you've risen to meet them, but we're all capable of--
translation.ko: 상담받고 있는 건 알지만 네가 원한다면…

translation.en: One thousand, two hundred seventy-eight days sober.
Do you know how long that is? Nearly three and a half years.
translation.ko: 얼마나 긴 기간인지 알아? 거의 3년 반이야

translation.en: Are you sure the wedding's not bringing back unhappy memories of what happened last time?
translation.ko: 전에 겪었던 괴로운 경험이 결혼 때문에 상기된 게 아니야?

translation.en: It was a complete freak event.
I'm partnering you up on the Joe Burkett case.
Oh, no, no, no. Come on.
Marty McGreggor. He's young, he's bright,
translation.ko: 마티 맥그레거야 젊고 성격 좋은 친구니까 선배의 지혜를 빌려줘

translation.en: and he'll benefit from the wisdom of an older man.
translation.ko: 젊고 성격 좋은 친구니까 선배의 지혜를 빌려줘

translation.en: So I'm being babysat by a child?
-[Sami groans] -See it as someone to help you avoid cats.
[Marty] Oh my God, this is-- this is so exciting.
Sir, I'm really stoked to be…
You know, I think we'll be a really good team.
-Oh God. -I think-- Are you-- Are you stoked?
Just here. Yeah. Yes, yes, I'm stoked. Very stoked.
This is where the attack happened. Do you know who Margrete was?
translation.ko: 여기서 사건이 벌어졌어 마르그레테가 누구인지 알아?

translation.en: The ruler of Denmark, Norway, and Sweden in the 1300s.
And this is where Joe Burkett was murdered on the night of the 12th.
translation.ko: 12일 밤에 조 버킷이 살해당한 곳이 여기야

translation.en: The wife's statement's all we have to go on.
translation.ko: 우리가 의지할 수 있는 건 부인의 진술뿐이지

translation.en: You know she left the army under controversial circumstances?
translation.ko: 부인이 퇴역할 때 논란이 많았던 거 알지?

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. It was a kind of a whistleblower thing, right?
translation.ko: 네, 내부 고발 같은 게 있었죠?

translation.en: Yeah, she killed innocent civilians. Corey the Whistle leaked the details.
translation.ko: 무고한 민간인을 살해했다고 고발자 코리가 폭로했어

translation.en: -People wanted her in prison. I remember. -Yeah.
And then today, she claimed to see her dead husband alive.
translation.ko: 남편이 살아 있는 걸 봤다고 부인이 오늘 주장했어

translation.en: She lost her sister and her husband in a short period of time,
translation.ko: 짧은 기간에 자매와 남편을 모두 잃고

translation.en: if she did do it, maybe she's trying to show us that she's losing it,
translation.ko: 미쳐 가는 사람처럼 비치고 싶은 걸지도 몰라

translation.en: you know, to plead diminished responsibility.
Well… does she have a motive?
Well, you learn motive isn't always clear.
translation.ko: 뭐, 동기가 늘 분명한 건 아니잖아

translation.en: I mean, Burkett Global Enterprises. Kerching!
translation.ko: 그렇지, 시댁이 부자잖아요 버킷 글로벌 엔터프라이즈 빵빵하죠

translation.en: Is she in line for a big payout?
But most of the money goes into trust for their daughter,
translation.ko: 보험금 대부분은 딸 신탁 자금으로 넣자고

translation.en: but that was all pre-agreed years ago.
translation.ko: 보험금 대부분은 딸 신탁 자금으로 넣자고 몇 년 전에 이미 합의했어

translation.en: So, well, maybe it is exactly as she says, you know.
Which is why we need a ballistics check on her gun.
translation.ko: 그러니까 부인의 총기에 탄도 검사를 실시해 봐야 해

translation.en: Oh, but yeah. Okay, I'll get on it. [chuckles]
Yeah. And while you're there, chase them up on the bullets.
translation.ko: 그래, 그리고 가는 김에 총알 검사 결과도 확인해 봐

translation.en: I requested a matching review to see
translation.ko: 조를 죽인 총이 다른 사건에 쓰였는지 확인하려고

translation.en: if the killer's gun could be linked to any other incidents.
translation.ko: 조 시신의 총알을 조사해 달라고 요청했거든
탄도 검사랑 총알 검사 네, 대장님 그러지 마

translation.en: Don't. Never-- Never do that again. Just…
Oh, it's, uh, chocolate, whey protein, spinach, and a little bit of banana.
translation.ko: 초콜릿, 유청 단백질 시금치랑 바나나 약간요

translation.en: -You should… -I should. Yeah, okay, well, I'll…
-I'll see you-- I'll see you back at-- -Yep.
Hello, you reach Izabella. Please leave a message and I'll get back to you.
Have you seen Izabella up your way?
Uh, yeah, I think I saw her come back a little while ago.
-Think she's at the house in the grounds. -All right. Okay. Thanks. Bye.
translation.ko: - 아마 저택에 계실 거예요 - 고마워요, 그럼 수고하세요

translation.en: -Hi, Lily. Hi, Auntie Maya. -Hi, Dan. We haven't seen you in ages.
translation.ko: - 이모랑 릴리네, 잘 지냈어요? - 안녕, 댄 너무 오랜만에 본다

translation.en: -Sorry, Auntie Maya. -[chuckles] Is your dad in?
[Maya] There you go. Go and find Abby.
Do you mind looking after Lily for me for an hour? I need to speak to someone.
translation.ko: 릴리 좀 한 시간만 봐 줄래요? 누구랑 얘기를 해야 해서요

translation.en: I'll come and see you today. Maybe second half.
translation.ko: 오늘 경기 보러 갈게 후반전에 갈 것 같아

translation.en: -You don't need to. -No, I want to.
translation.ko: - 안 와도 돼요 - 아니야, 가고 싶어

translation.en: -How are you getting there? -[Eddie] How do you think?
translation.ko: - 잘 지냈지? - 잘 지낼 것 같아요?

translation.en: What, with that in your hand?
I don't drink and drive, Maya. It's one drink.
translation.ko: 음주 운전은 안 해요, 마이아 딱 한 캔이라고요

translation.en: It's bad enough that the kids are living in the house that their mum was killed in.
translation.ko: 엄마 죽은 곳에 사는 것만으로도 애들 정서에 이미 안 좋아요

translation.en: -I'm dealing with it. -Saying that for weeks.
translation.ko: - 내가 처리할게요 - 그렇게 말한 게 몇 주째잖아요

translation.en: Well, maybe you'll understand when you start to throw Joe's stuff.
translation.ko: 조의 물건들을 버려야 하면 당신도 이해할 거예요

translation.en: Know how it feels now, don't you?
-My wife, my problem. -Yeah, and my sister, Eddie.
translation.ko: - 제 아내니 제 문제예요 - 제 자매이기도 해요, 에디

translation.en: I know I wasn't here as much as she'd have liked.
translation.ko: 언니가 원했던 만큼 내가 같이 있어 주지 못한 건 알아요

translation.en: But you were off saving the world?
She hated you being away. You know that.
translation.ko: 당신과 떨어져 있기 싫어했어요 알고 있죠?

translation.en: She was worried every shithole conflict you went to would be your last,
translation.ko: 그놈의 전투에 나갈 때마다 당신이 결국 목숨을 잃어서

translation.en: and one day she'd get a call telling her as much.
But it was the other way around.
I've been, uh, updating Judith. How's the nanny situation?
translation.ko: 어머님께 소식 전하느라요 보모 사건은 어떻게 됐나요?

translation.en: Well, I'm going to see Izabella now to talk about it.
-Why she took my SD card. -Come on, Maya.
translation.ko: - SD 카드를 가져간 이유도요 - 마이아, 제발

translation.en: But she saw what I saw.
translation.ko: 하지만 이저벨라는 분명 그 영상을 봤어요

translation.en: And now she won't even speak to me.
-Do you want me to come with you? -No, thanks.
Will you just open the door?
Please. I just need to talk to you about Joe.
translation.ko: 부탁이에요, 조 관련해서 얘기를 하고 싶어요

translation.en: I'm sorry I grabbed you. I panicked. Just…
translation.ko: 팔 당긴 건 미안해요 너무 놀라서 그랬어요

translation.en: Oh yeah, they, uh-- they changed it. Don't know why.
Feel free to walk home after dance lesson.
translation.ko: 댄스 레슨 끝나고 집까지 걸어가도 돼

translation.en: -I'm so sorry. I-- I don't know the-- -I'll close up late.
translation.ko: 죄송해요, 깜빡해서… 내가 늦게 당기지, 뭐

translation.en: -[teacher] Two, three, four. Slide. Slide. -♪ You're the most supreme ♪
We've got our work cut out.
[coach] Don't give the ball away. Chase it. Chase it. Keep moving. Come on.
translation.ko: 공 주지 말고 쫓아가 계속 뛰어, 계속

translation.en: -Go on, Abby! Go on! -[coach] Pretend it's a donut, Abby.
translation.ko: 힘내, 애비! 공을 도넛이라고 생각해, 애비 그래야 네가 뛰지

translation.en: That'll get you moving. My granny could play better than you.
translation.ko: 공을 도넛이라고 생각해, 애비 그래야 네가 뛰지 우리 집 할망구가 너희보다 잘하겠다

translation.en: Move it. Faster, you bloody donkeys! Come on!
translation.ko: 너희가 뭔 거북이 새끼냐? 빨리빨리 움직여

translation.en: Faster! Talk to each other! Come on!
[coach] Chase it! Quicker. Quicker. Come on!
Maybe ease up on the cakes. Yeah? Your bulk's not helping.
translation.ko: 케이크 좀 그만 주워 먹어 덩치만 불려서 뭐 하냐?

translation.en: -Yeah, I'm Maya Stern. I'm Abby's aunt. -Maya, don't.
translation.ko: 전 마이아 스턴이에요 애비 이모인데요 - 이모, 그러지 말아요 - 뉘신지 나도 압니다

translation.en: [coach] Yeah, I know who you are, Captain.
translation.ko: - 이모, 그러지 말아요 - 뉘신지 나도 압니다

translation.en: They're kids. I'm ex-forces, and I've heard sergeant majors go easier.
translation.ko: 어린애들이라고요 난 파병 군인인데 선임 부사관도 당신처럼 말하진 않아요
- 얘들도 창피한 줄 알아야죠 - 감독님이 창피해야죠

translation.en: -You can't speak to kids like that. -Who the hell are you? I'm a winner.
translation.ko: 애들한테 그렇게 말하면 안 돼요 당신이 뭐라고요? 내가 책임자예요

translation.en: -Oh my God. -Yeah? You want rainbows and bluebells?
Well, get her in the art club. Now, excuse me. I’m coaching a team.
translation.ko: 미술부 시키든가요 난 경기 감독하러 갑니다

translation.en: Okay, yeah. You're a rude man.
-Don't turn your back on me. -Get off.
I said, don't turn your back on me!
Give me an excuse to put you down.
-Nah, you're not worth it. -Yeah, I thought so.
translation.ko: 됐어, 싸울 가치도 없어 내 생각도 그래요

translation.en: -Wait in the car, please. -Oh, here we go.
-I don't want you around my children. -Oh, Eddie, come on. The guy was a bully.
translation.ko: - 우리 애들한테서 떨어져요 - 왜 이래요? - 감독이 괴롭혔잖아요 - 그게 문제가 아녜요

translation.en: -You don't get it, do you? -No. Obviously I don't. No.
translation.ko: - 못 알아듣겠어요? - 네, 무슨 소리인지 모르겠네요

translation.en: You sure you've only had that one drink?
translation.ko: 진짜 한 캔만 마신 거 맞아요?

translation.en: You think I wasn't torn in half when my sister died?
translation.ko: 언니가 죽었을 때 내 마음은 안 찢어졌을 것 같아요?

translation.en: I wasn't even here, Eddie. They're her kids.
translation.ko: 난 심지어 여기에 없었죠 쟤들은 언니 애들이라고요

translation.en: -They're all I have left of her. -Stay away.
-No, you can't do that! -You stay the fuck away!
So, I spoke with Sharon about the dress.
She said that this little fella will definitely show,
translation.ko: 이 꼬마 녀석은 티가 날 수밖에 없다더라

translation.en: but she said she can do some kind of,
I don't know, frill thing to conceal it a bit.
translation.ko: 뭐랬더라? 프릴 같은 걸 달아서 좀 가려 주겠대

translation.en: But everyone attending knows that you're pregnant, so…
translation.ko: 하지만 식에 오는 사람은 다 당신이 임신한 걸 알 텐데

translation.en: I want to look the blushing bride…
-[sighs] -…not like we're dashing down the aisle because you managed to slip one past the goalie.
Plus, they gave me a partner.
Is that a bad thing? Yes.
He's about three. A health nut.
Duran Duran came on the radio. He'd never even heard of them.
translation.ko: 지금 라디오에 듀란 듀란 나오는데 걔는 이름 들어 본 적도 없을걸
- 뭐 이런 꼰대가 있어? - 아니, 내 말은…

translation.en: I'm not saying he should like them, not saying he should recite their lyrics,
translation.ko: 걔가 듀란 듀란을 좋아하거나 가사를 외워야 한단 게 아니라

translation.en: but he never even heard of them.
No, I agree. He should be fired immediately.
translation.ko: 아냐, 당신 말에 동의해 얼른 잘라 버려야겠네

translation.en: Come here, you big, daft bugger.
An important job, but a job nonetheless.
Yo. It's Marty. I've, um, just sent you the ballistics report
translation.ko: 마티인데요, 조 버킷 시신의 총알 분석 결과가 나와서

translation.en: on the bullets that killed Joe Burkett.
Yeah. You're not going to believe your eyes.
translation.ko: 네 열어 보면 깜짝 놀라실 거예요

translation.en: BULLETS MATCH THOSE FROM A 9MM GLOCK 17 4TH GEN
-[Shane] Who wants a hot dog? -[Maya] Shane, got you this.
translation.ko: - 핫도그 먹을 사람? - 셰인, 이거 마셔

translation.en: -[Shane] Beer! -There you go. Here you are, Bono.
-Thank you. -When's your next tour kicking off?
Gotta say, I'm glad you're not going back there.
translation.ko: 네가 다시 나갈 일 없어서 다행이야

translation.en: Although if it wasn't for you, Brian wouldn't be here. So…
translation.ko: 하지만 네가 들어온 탓에 벤도 나가지를 않으니

translation.en: -[clinks] -Not sure whether that's a good thing.

translation.ko: - 안 돼, 그거 할 거지? - 아냐

translation.en: -Come on in. Gather in. -[Maya] I hate when he does this.
-Yes. Well, I wanted to thank you… -[chuckles]
…for having us bunch of degenerates over at your humble palace, maybe?
translation.ko: 우리처럼 지저분한 놈들을 네 소중한… 궁전 맞지?

translation.en: And I think I speak for everybody when I say…
[breathes deeply] …we've missed you loads, little sister.
-Oh, for God's sake, stop it! -Okay, okay, okay.

translation.ko: 마이아를 위해 - 여지껏 함께 일한 - 그만해

translation.en: -…the best combat copter pilot I've ever flown with, our Captain.
translation.ko: 전투 헬기 조종사 중 으뜸가는 우리 대위님을 위해!

translation.en: [Maya sighs in relief] Cheers. You okay?
You. You're treating me like a widow.
Maya, I hate to break it to you, but that's exactly what you are.
translation.ko: 이런 말 하긴 싫지만 진짜 과부 맞잖아

translation.en: Which is convenient, really, because you've always suited black.
translation.ko: 편한 점도 있겠다, 넌 항상 검은 옷이 잘 어울렸으니까

translation.en: I know this is going to sound crazy, Shane.
But I keep thinking that I'm seeing him.
People do this all the time.
When you lose someone, it's like…
I dunno. It's like you still want them to be there, you know?
translation.ko: 그 사람이 계속 곁에 있어 주기를 바라니까

translation.en: I'm going to sound even crazier now when I tell you this.
translation.ko: 이 얘기까지 하면 내가 더 광인처럼 보일 텐데
내 생각에는 - 누가 내 뒤를 밟는 것 같아 - 누가?
- 누가 내 뒤를 밟는 것 같아 - 누가?

translation.en: I've seen the same car twice.
I've noted down the plate. It's a red Volkswagen.
translation.ko: 차량 번호를 적어 놨어 빨간색 폭스바겐이더라

translation.en: -Do you think you can find the owner? -[sighs] Not legally.
translation.ko: 차주 찾을 수 있어? - 합법적으로는 안 돼 - 가능한 거네

translation.en: Maya, what happened? Izabella's saying she won't work for you anymore.
translation.ko: 마이아, 이게 어떻게 된 거니? 이저벨라가 너희 집에서 일 안 하겠대

translation.en: Right, well, don't let her leave. I'll come over now, yeah? Keep her there.
translation.ko: 제가 바로 갈 테니까 붙들어 두세요 어디 못 가게 하세요

translation.en: -Izabella! What'd you do with the SD card? -Fuck you. She's scared of you!
translation.ko: 이저벨라! - SD 카드 어쨌어요? - 미쳤어요? - 당신을 무서워해요! - 안 비키면 다칠 줄 알아요

translation.en: Let me past, or I swear to God--
translation.ko: - 당신을 무서워해요! - 안 비키면 다칠 줄 알아요

translation.en: -Leave her alone. -I just need to talk to her about Joe.
translation.ko: - 접근하지 말아요 - 루카 조 얘기만 물어보면 돼요

translation.en: Why did you let her leave?
What was I supposed to do? Keep her prisoner?
I needed to speak with her, Judith.
-I didn't attack her. -You laid hands on her?
translation.ko: - 공격한 적 없어요 - 걔 몸에 손을 댔어?

translation.en: -Why did you do that? -Why was she here?
translation.ko: 왜 그런 짓을 했어? 그 사람은 왜 온 거죠?

translation.en: Well, her family has been employed by ours for many years.
translation.ko: 그 애 가족은 오랫동안 우리 집에서 일했어

translation.en: -Long before you came. -Oh, so you believe her?
translation.ko: - 네가 이 집에 오기 훨씬 전부터 - 그래서 이저벨라를 믿으세요?

translation.en: Does it matter that I was married to your son?
translation.ko: 제가 어머님 며느리인 건 중요하지 않고요?

translation.en: Does it matter that I'm the mother of your grandchild?
translation.ko: 제가 손주의 어머니라는 건 의미가 없나요?

translation.en: She says she caught you spying.
And did she tell you what I saw?
I don't know how, but that's what I saw.
translation.ko: 영문을 알 수 없지만 분명 나는 봤어요

translation.en: How can a dead man appear on a secret camera?
translation.ko: 어떻게 감시 카메라에 죽은 사람이 찍히죠?

translation.en: How can-- How can a dead man cuddle his own daughter?
Now, you know that can't be true.
-And then you started accusing Izabella. -It wasn't a vision, Judith. He was there.
translation.ko: 그러더니 이저벨라를 탓하네 환상이 아니에요, 정말 봤다고요

translation.en: -Please don't swear in my home. -I know what I saw.
translation.ko: 내 집에서 욕하지 마 똑똑히 봤어요

translation.en: What, my dead son whom we buried?
I'm going to tell you the truth now, Maya. I'm worried about you.
translation.ko: 사실대로 말해 주마, 마이아 난 네가 걱정된다

translation.en: All those things you went through when you were abroad.

translation.ko: - 전 괜찮아요 - 하지만 계속 회피만 했지

translation.en: -Are you saying I'm going mad? -No, I'm saying you never dealt with them.
translation.ko: 제가 미쳐 간다는 거예요? 제대로 해결한 적이 없단 얘기야

translation.en: And if I'm to be brutally honest,
I wonder whether you are in a fit state to be looking after that little girl right now.
translation.ko: 네가 과연 어린 딸을 돌볼 만한 상태인지 모르겠구나

translation.en: Don't you dare question my parenting.
Simple question. My son, did you love him?
Because I did, to my core.
But sometimes, when you were together--
translation.ko: 하지만 때때로 너희 둘이 있을 때…

translation.en: was there a voice in his ear,
translation.ko: 조의 귀에 누군가 속삭이지 않나 해서요

translation.en: "Was she really good enough for my special boy?"
translation.ko: '우리 소중한 아들한테 정말 저 여자가 어울리나?'

translation.en: Because I'm not one of you.
We're just having a bit of a barbecue.
Maya, the, um, 9-millimeter bullets we recovered from your husband's body,
translation.ko: 마이아, 저… 남편분 시신에서 9mm 구경 총알들을 찾았어요

translation.en: we ran them through ballistics to see if the bullets matched
translation.ko: 데이터베이스에 등록된 사건과 일치하는 정보가 있나 확인하려고

translation.en: any of the cases on our database.
The gun that killed your husband…
-was also used to kill your sister… -[eerie music playing]
